title: Jeremy Hunt – 2023 Spring Budget Speech
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Jeremy Hunt, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, in the House of Commons on 15 March 2023.
content:
Madam Deputy Speaker, in the face of enormous challenges I report today on a British economy which is proving the doubters wrong.
